name: American Red Cross of the Bay Area Chapter
description: The American Red Cross of the Bay Area Chapter provides relief to those affected by disasters and empowers individuals in the community to prepare for, respond to, and recover from emergencies. By helping people in the Bay Area learn how to take care of their families and neighbors, they strengthen our community and make it more resilient to disasters large and small. The Bay Area Chapter serves nearly 4.5 million people across the counties of Alameda, Contra Costa, San Francisco and San Mateo.
